comments:
(RC3)Test case8: Data explorer/Data source/Add flat file data source/Select Folder

Steps:
1. Right click on data source in data explorer
2. Choose New data source in context menu
3. New data source dialog pops up
4. Select "Flat File Data Source",Click "Next" button
5. Click on Choose Folder ? Button
6. Choose folder which contains flat file
7.Checkbox Use the second line as the data type 
8. Click on Finish
9. Left click in a items that have value in properties area

Expected result:
No exception 

Result:

(eclipse.buildId=I20060512-1600
java.version=1.5.0_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=zh_CN
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86)
